scripts.migrate:prod: NODE_ENV=production npm run typeorm -- migration:run -d dist/database/data-source.js
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run migrate:prod && npm run start:prod
scripts.migration:generate:dev: NODE_ENV=development npm run typeorm -- migration:generate src/database/migrations/migration -d src/database/data-source.ts
scripts.migration:generate:prod: NODE_ENV=production npm run typeorm -- migration:generate src/database/migrations/migration -d src/database/data-source.ts
scripts.migration:show:dev: NODE_ENV=development npm run typeorm -- migration:show -d src/database/data-source.ts
scripts.migration:show:prod: NODE_ENV=production npm run typeorm -- migration:show -d src/database/data-source.ts
scripts.migration:run:dev: NODE_ENV=development npm run typeorm -- migration:run -d src/database/data-source.ts
scripts.migration:run:prod: NODE_ENV=production npm run typeorm -- migration:run -d dist/database/data-source.js
scripts.migration:revert:dev: NODE_ENV=development npm run typeorm -- migration:revert -d src/database/data-source.ts
scripts.migration:revert:prod: NODE_ENV=production npm run typeorm -- migration:revert -d dist/database/data-source.js
scripts.migration:fake:prod: NODE_ENV=production npm run typeorm -- query "INSERT INTO migrations (timestamp, name) VALUES (1708301400000, 'CreateUserTable1708301400000')" -d dist/database/data-source.js
